model.description: One of the available [TTS models](/docs/models/tts): `tts-1` or `tts-1-hd`

response_format.description: The format to audio in. Supported formats are `mp3`, `opus`, `aac`, and `flac`.

speed.description: The speed of the generated audio. Select a value from `0.25` to `4.0`. `1.0` is the default.

text.description: The text to generate audio for. The maximum length is 4096 characters.

voice.description: The voice to use when generating the audio. Supported voices are `alloy`, `echo`, `fable`, `onyx`, `nova`, and `shimmer`.
